videos.title: Your $10K Savings Is Shrinking
videos.hook: Your $10,000 savings is secretly shrinking right now.
videos.concept: The hidden erosion of savings due to inflation

script.visual: Jonathan looking directly at camera, serious expression, calculator in hand
script.audio: Your $10,000 savings? It's secretly shrinking right now.
script.notes: Hook - pause for a beat, let it land

script.visual: Cut to phone screen showing bank account with $10,000 balance
script.audio: See that $10,000 in your savings account?

script.visual: Cut back to Jonathan holding up calculator
script.audio: It still says $10,000. But here's what your grocery bill knows that your balance doesn't.

script.visual: B-roll: grocery cart filling up, price tags on shelves
script.audio: Every year, inflation quietly steals about 2.4% of your buying power.

script.visual: Cut to whiteboard - Jonathan writes '1,200' in big red marker
script.audio: That means if you have 50K sitting there, you're losing $1,200 in value every single year.

script.visual: Cut to Jonathan back at camera, more animated
script.audio: Not because someone took it. Because your money's power just... leaked away.

script.visual: B-roll: Federal Reserve building, printing money visual metaphor
script.audio: When the Fed pumps trillions into the economy, they cut the same pizza into more slices.

script.visual: Close-up on Jonathan, conspiratorial tone
script.audio: Your slice? Smaller. Same dollar, buys less.

script.visual: Back to whiteboard - writes 'HYSA' and 'I-Bonds'
script.audio: So here's the fix: Move your emergency fund to high-yield savings. Look at I-Bonds. Do something.

script.visual: Cut to Jonathan holding coffee mug, more relaxed
script.audio: Because keeping cash in a regular savings account earning half a percent?

script.visual: Zoom in close on face - authority moment
script.audio: That's not saving. That's letting inflation win.

script.visual: Pull back, Jonathan friendly smile
script.audio: NC familiesâ€”I help Triangle families protect their money. Drop MONEY if you want me to show you how.

script.visual: Text overlay: 'Follow for more money truths' with arrow pointing to bio
script.audio: And follow for more money truths they don't teach us in school.

videos.title: Stop Waiting for Prices to Drop
videos.hook: Stop waiting for prices to drop. Here's why they won't.
videos.concept: Why housing prices aren't dropping due to M2 growth and local demand

script.visual: Jonathan at whiteboard, marker in hand, facing camera
script.audio: Stop waiting for prices to drop. They're not coming down.

script.visual: Turn to whiteboard, write 'M2' in big letters
script.audio: Between 2020 and 2021, something crazy happened.

script.visual: Still at whiteboard, draw arrow up, write '+40%'
script.audio: M2 money supply grew 40%. That's the fastest in modern history.

script.visual: Cut to B-roll: Raleigh-Durham skyline, construction cranes
script.audio: Translation? Way more money sloshing around, chasing the same stuff.

script.visual: Cut back to Jonathan, walking shot through office space
script.audio: Then here in the Triangle, unemployment dropped in 99 of 100 counties last year.

script.visual: Stop walking, turn to camera
script.audio: That means more people with paychecks. More buyers. More demand.

script.visual: Quick cut: housing listings, 'For Sale' signs, new builds
script.audio: Plus we're one of the fastest-growing regions in the country.

script.visual: Back to whiteboard - write equation: More Money + More People = ?
script.audio: So here's your math problem: More money plus more people moving here equals...

script.visual: Fill in the answer: 'Higher Prices Forever'
script.audio: Higher prices. Not temporary. Not 'waiting out the market.' Forever.

script.visual: Cut to Jonathan leaning on desk, coffee mug
script.audio: I know that's not what you want to hear. But someone needs to say it.

script.visual: Stand up, more energy, to camera
script.audio: The play isn't timing. It's positioning. Get in where you can. Plan for the long game.

script.visual: Close-up face shot
script.audio: Because inflation plus growth is the strongest inflation there is.

script.visual: Text overlay 'Link in bio for a free call' with Calendly link
script.audio: Link in bio for a free consultation. Let's build your plan.

script.visual: End screen: 'Subscribe for Triangle-specific money tips'
script.audio: Subscribe for Triangle-specific money tips. You deserve to know this stuff.

videos.title: I Wish I Knew This at 25
videos.hook: I wish I knew this at 25.
videos.concept: The relationship between money supply growth and purchasing power erosion

script.visual: Jonathan sitting at desk, calculator in hand, looking up at camera
script.audio: I wish I knew this at 25.

script.visual: Cut to Jonathan looking down, then back up
script.audio: Every dollar you save? It's in a war. And most people don't even know they're losing.

script.visual: Stand up, walk to whiteboard
script.audio: Here's what nobody explained to me.

script.visual: At whiteboard, draw a simple pie, write '$22.4 Trillion'
script.audio: M2 is all the money in America. Cash, savings, everything. About 22.4 trillion dollars.

script.visual: Draw more slices, the pie gets smaller per slice
script.audio: When it grows 5.7% a year? They're cutting your slice into smaller pieces.

script.visual: Cut to B-roll: 2020 pandemic footage, stimulus checks, empty shelves
script.audio: Then 2020 hit. The Fed pumped trillions in. 40% growth in 18 months.

script.visual: Cut back to Jonathan, pointing at camera
script.audio: And 2022? 9% inflation. No coincidence. More money, same stuff, higher prices.

script.visual: Quick cut: 'But why is it only 2.4% now?' text overlay
script.audio: So why's inflation only 2.4% now?

script.visual: Back to whiteboard, draw a dam with water behind it
script.audio: Because velocity is low. Money's sitting there like water behind a dam.

script.visual: Close-up on Jonathan, serious
script.audio: But when that dam breaks? When people start spending again?

script.visual: Draw dam breaking, water rushing out
script.audio: All that money hits at once. Inflation comes roaring back.

script.visual: Cut to Jonathan back at desk, holding coffee
script.audio: At 25, I thought cash was safe. I was wrong. Cash is just slowly dying.

script.visual: Lean forward, directly to camera
script.audio: You can't control the Fed. But you can protect yourself. Start now.

script.visual: Text overlay 'Comment PROTECT for my inflation-proof checklist'
script.audio: Comment PROTECT for my inflation-proof checklist. Let's stop the bleeding.

script.visual: End card: Jonathan giving thumbs up
script.audio: You've got this.

notes.style_guide: Conversational, visual-first, attention-grabbing. Casual dress (button-down), office/home setting.
notes.filming_tips: Phone + decent lighting is fine. Visual changes every 3-5 seconds. Speak-to-camera moments for authority.
